caption_original: Today is World Fisheries Day! Fish are a staple in many traditional Indigenous diets in Canada. Learn more about how First Nation communities are working with the Government of Canada to protect fish against the effects of climate change. For example, the Dehcho in the Northwest Territories are monitoring mercury levels found in fish in their region. http://ow.ly/v0JK30gIPT1
